text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, please try raising both your hands! 
As high as you can! Like cherry blossoms 
in full bloom!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
………… Great, that's enough. 
You can slowly put them down.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
How do you feel? It's a stretch technique my 
father taught me! Doesn't it feel refreshing, 
like your body naturally loosens up?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
I know it's important to get things done, but… 
We should also treasure the times that we're 
able to bask in sunlight and just breathe♪
